website_summaries.verdict: This poncho covers well and will keep you dry without wrapping you in plastic.
pros: Sized from S to XXL to help get a comfortable fit
Has a hood to keep head dry
Roomy enough for several layers underneath
Keeps you dry without overheating you on warm days
cons: The material on this poncho is very thin
The hood does not have a drawstring

customer_reviews.title: Good for light-medium rain and also cute
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty much as flattering as a poncho can be. It's actually really cute. This is not plastic fabric - it will not be waterproof. However, it is water resistant (as advertised) and it will withstand the sort of rain that comes with a Pacific Northwest fall and winter. The hood is great! It's big enough to fully protect my face from the rain.
customer_reviews.author: Jenserai

customer_reviews.title: OMG pockets!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described! I didn't heed the advice of another reviewer to order a size smaller; I should have. I ordered a size up because I'm busty, but it seems like the real difference between sizes is length. I like the oversized effect and the extra length, so I won't bother exchanging it. Resist the urge to order a bigger size unless you plan to wear this over a heavy winter coat.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly B

customer_reviews.title: Just great
customer_reviews.text: This rain poncho is wonderful. Thick enough to look good, but small enough to stuff in a backpack. I wanted rainwear that would cover a camera hanging around my neck and allow me to get the camera out easily. The zipper front works great. The hood would be better with a way to tighten it, but otherwise it is perfectly. I have the red, and people compliment me often. A couple of people have borrowed it and asked where they could get one. Really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Packable Rain Cape - Beautiful and functional.
customer_reviews.text: Originally purchased in the Medium size due to other reviews. Returned for the Large. It was too tight in the shoulders for me. I normally wear extra large...but the Large was perfect. The sleeves and cuffs will fit easily fit over a jacket....and it will pack down to practically nothing!!! The zipper works like a charm. The Blue is beautiful, not flashy. The material is soft but you can tell it's water resistant. Over all I am very excited and love the cape.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: which is fine. The poncho is made of a rip-stop type ...
customer_reviews.text: The rain poncho arrived in a plastic envelope and was, of course, wrinkled. I tossed it into the dryer, set it on low, timed it for 20 minutes, then hung it on a hanger. The wrinkles fell out. I am petite in stature (5"1") and the sleeves came down to mid hand, which is fine. The poncho is made of a rip-stop type of material and draped fashionably on me. Very lightweight. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: cardinal

customer_reviews.title: Great for me
customer_reviews.text: I am in a wheelchair and it covers my knees to keep my legs dry. Works wonderful for me and my needs. I really don’t know where the length falls on me standing. It is not bulky and does not interfere with the wheelchair wheels. Sleeves are long enough that I am not soaked It also does not have that breathtaking pvc odor
customer_reviews.author: Happy legs

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and resistant!
customer_reviews.text: This ponch did it’s job! I purchased this product because of the color. I was preparing to go on strike the following week and needed something Red for Ed. I knew we would be out in the cold with heavy rain as it was forecasted to pour for four days straight. Not only did this poncho keep me dry, it allowed me to wear several layers underneath to keep me warm. I even wore a coat and felt super comfortable and was able to move around with ease. I bought a size smaller and felt It was perfect, but I’m thinking I could have even gone two sizes smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena B.

customer_reviews.title: Great travel raincoat n backpack packable
customer_reviews.text: no dislikes Easy to slip on. For those who complained of the zipper. Dont rush, but then you can leave it permanently zippered and just mess with the top area. Easy to slip on. P.S. I travel a lot and dont like to toy with perfect fits etc. I want to be able to cover myself completely w/o worrying of back packs etc so I ordered up 2x my size. PERFECT.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Kaleinani Kanealii-Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking on, even XL
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a trip to Europe. Love the lightweight aspect, can carry it in my purse. No need to carry a raincoat. Zipper gives more flexibility. Looks much nicer than just a basic rain poncho and has enough room to carry your purse underneath. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: tillie

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage
customer_reviews.text: Is a little longer in the back which I like. Some I have seen are about hip length so doesn’t do much for below the waist coverage. This one is about mid-thigh in front and longer in back. I am short and this is not too long. Much better coverage
customer_reviews.author: Deb-PA

customer_reviews.title: I purchased it for a trip to the topic during their rainy season and it performed beautifully. It covers me and my large back pack
customer_reviews.text: I got so many compliments on this. I purchased it for a trip to the topic during their rainy season and it performed beautifully. It covers me and my large back pack. I do wish it had elastic in the hood to cinch it, but it was still worth it. I hate seeing those flimsy plastic ponchos. This can be used over and over again. The zipper was a great feature.
customer_reviews.author: Katie D.

customer_reviews.title: The color is soft and pretty. I purchased this as a travel rain jacket
customer_reviews.text: Cute cape rain jacket. The color is soft and pretty. I purchased this as a travel rain jacket; light weight, packable and roomy for layering as the seasons turn. It is so attractive and fun that I’m using it as my summer rain jacket. It’s a grab and go basic rain garment.
customer_reviews.author: lz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect - Order ONE size SMALLER
customer_reviews.text: Ordered ONE size SMALLER and it worked perfectly. The red is vibrant and easy to spot in a crowd. Wore it overseas for a week through intermittent rain - exceeded expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Agatha Christie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice look, feel, and fit
customer_reviews.text: This is much nicer quality than I expected. I got it in gray and it actually looks dressy. Because of the buttons, it doesn't float around you like a tent, but ends up looking almost like a fitted jacket until you raise your arms, then you can tell it's a poncho. Seriously, I really like this style and I like the material too. It's not super-noisy like other ponchos.
customer_reviews.author: eview99

customer_reviews.title: Made from cheap plastic, don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: This is a cheaply made rain coat, it is cheap plastic. The picture makes it look like it is made from a polyester material, but it isn't. I bought a rain poncho for $5.00 that is better than this. I can't believe they would sell this for $37.00, when made from cheap plastic. Would not recommend buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy VanHorn

customer_reviews.title: Great for storms!
customer_reviews.text: Love this item! I needed something big and roomy to wear a sweater/fleece underneath and this fits the bill. In the first week I wore this in three rainstorms and it was great!
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Not as SHOWN
customer_reviews.text: In the photo the green is darker than the one I received. It has barely any color at all. Extremely pale pistachio. And in the photo of the hood looks like it is lined with a shiny fabric. Mine has none of that. The one in the photo looks high quality, mine looks and fells cheap! Total misrepresentation. Even the hood looks smaller. Otherwise I can say that it is true to size. However still , very disappointed and will be returning for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: S.N.

customer_reviews.title: I am quite pleased with this I live in the rainiest city in ...
customer_reviews.text: I am quite pleased with this I live in the rainiest city in the US - Mobile AL - look it up If you don’t believe me. Our climate is warm and muggy. This poncho keeps me dry without getting overheated. The pockets are great for car keys or Mardi Gras throws. It dries quickly and is very squashable.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Fits over a packpack
customer_reviews.text: Being that I cant carry a handbag or an umbrella, like that the poncho/cape is adequate enough to also cover my backpack in inclement weather. Only negative is wish there was some sort of tie as hood does not stay on my head as there is no closure or snap. I'm going to try and rig something up myself, either out or plastic or an old scarf.
customer_reviews.author: MermaidD

customer_reviews.title: very roomy poncho
customer_reviews.text: I haven't worn this in the rain yet, but it seems like it will be very functional. It is very large and roomy. I normally wear an xl in most things but had to return that and ordered a Medium instead. Honestly, I could have even gone down to a small and it would have been fine. It's big enough to cover me and a back pack or big purse with room to spare. Seems to be good quality and I really like that it is sewn on the sides instead of closing with snaps under the arms. Looks a bit like a shorter version of a Harry Potter robe when it is on.
customer_reviews.author: Alesia A.Top Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: I was very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with this. I read some reviews that said it was plasticy - I didn't think it was plasticy at all. It feels like the nylon fabric that my more expensive windbreaker is made from. I got it for a European trip in the fall, and it should be good to layer over a sweater and it's big enough for my cross body travel purse. I may get it in another color!
customer_reviews.author: Kath Heytink

customer_reviews.title: Buy a size smaller than you wear.  Really.
customer_reviews.text: First, it’s HUGE. I’m normally size L, bought an XL to cover bulky sweaters. Could’ve worn a medium! I’m keeping it anyway because it would cover me for a big backpack & bulky coat if needed. Love the color. Hubby says the shape looks nice with the way they did the sleeves.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Buttons stuck together.
customer_reviews.text: Took this with me on my trip to Seattle, it's a great poncho, but the first time I unbuttoned it, I noticed the buttons were completely stuck to each other and I couldn't even get my nails to separate it. I finally had to pull it to unsnap it and it ripped! All the other buttons felt the same way so I had to be so careful not to rip the poncho because that was our first day of vacation.
customer_reviews.author: N.C

customer_reviews.title: Heed the warnings!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had paid more attention to the reviews that said this poncho runs large. It really does! I'm a large lady who usually wears a 2X so that's what I ordered. I felt swamped in this! I have returned it for a smaller size since I liked the way it looked and feels.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rain cape gets job done but...
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars for inaccurate size ...not fancy, perfect for quick grocery store trips but not for heavy rain as it has no liner. Arrived with a different name on label tool, but it is what I ordered, a rain cape. It's larger than I expected it to be and I ordered it a size smaller than I normally would have. XL is really XXL..lol.
customer_reviews.author: NetizenQ

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great item
customer_reviews.text: Perfect rain cape. There is plenty of room for a sweater or coat under this item. I ordered pink and it is pretty. Would like drawstring on good, but that’s a small issue.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Hengst

customer_reviews.title: Durable and perfect for a hike in the rain
customer_reviews.text: So in the rain on a mountain in Spain this managed to keep my core and my camelback dry. Despite it being perfect for its function and durable if you need it I suggest wearing a wind breaker under it because its not warm at all.
customer_reviews.author: Emilie Rengler

customer_reviews.title: Nice, low-priced portable rain slicker!
customer_reviews.text: Nice Raincoat! Folds up nicely but I wish there was a pouch for it. It's a tiny bit more plastic-y than I thought it would be. But still, it's way better than the alternative pricier models. For example, this one actually hangs long enough to cover your forearms where the pricier one does not.
customer_reviews.author: Wewah

customer_reviews.title: Huge Ugly Lime Plastic Bag
customer_reviews.text: The actual poncho looks nothing like the online image. It is not nylon it is plastic. I returned this trash bag.
customer_reviews.author: Elegant Furnishings

customer_reviews.title: as expected
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'3" 114 lbs and this is quite large but that's how ponchos are. I bought this for my central america trip and wanted something big to cover me in case I'm caught in the rain and this seems like it will do the trick. The quality is quite nice and it wasn't even that wrinkled when I opened it.
customer_reviews.author: kellygirl193

customer_reviews.title: CHECK IT BEFORE YOU KEEP IT!
customer_reviews.text: Mine came with a huge rip and I didn't see it until the return date passed. Really upsetting because it was hidden by the hood but now its the most useless poncho ever because rain just runs right off my head into my clothes. Can't believe I wasted money on it.
customer_reviews.author: ATG

customer_reviews.title: Hood too small
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter. She said that the hood is too small and won’t stay up. More of the size for a small child. Other than that it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me dry and is slightly reflective so its good for walking after dark
customer_reviews.text: I'm really impressed with this little poncho. Keeps me dry and is slightly reflective so its good for walking after dark.
customer_reviews.author: Red-n-Norcal

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in grey and love it! Made out of a great light weight yet sturdy material, NOT plastic like so many others. Looks great and covers you completely so you stay dry.
customer_reviews.author: RavenFan

customer_reviews.title: Hooded raincoat is easy on and off and compact to pack.
customer_reviews.text: I got one for me and one for my daughter in law because she has a new baby. I often have things in my hand that don’t allow me to hold an umbrella. My daughter in law can hold the baby inside the generous poncho like coat and use the convenient hood to keep her head dry. I love the light weight that repels wind and rain.
customer_reviews.author: tn8clady

customer_reviews.title: This is a large poncho, no shape to it at all.
customer_reviews.text: It really is a large plastic poncho. I ended up not wearing it due to the fit or lack there of. It would be useful if it were cold outa day you had many layers underneath but I purchased to wear to a baseball game and was not flattering at all.
customer_reviews.author: n2bks

customer_reviews.title: not very water resistant
customer_reviews.text: I loved the fit of the poncho style and the fact that i could wear a back pack underneath. We were in a heavy drizzle and with the hood on, my hair still got wet. The rest of my body was damp but not wet. I would not purchase this product again....especially at that price. Seek out a decent rain coat. I wish that I would have gone with something more protective.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy T.

customer_reviews.title: a beautiful addition to one's wardrobe
customer_reviews.text: very well made and a very ample fit. a beautiful addition to one's wardrobe !
customer_reviews.author: rosemary johnson

customer_reviews.title: Served its purpose
customer_reviews.text: Ordered to were while I recovered from shoulder surgery. Easy to put on and take off, don’t know if I’ll wear after I recover
customer_reviews.author: linda garcia

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a poncho. Works Great to keep me dry. Covers everything above the knees. Two people can fit in it at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Pati

customer_reviews.title: Works well as a rain protector when I walk the ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well as a rain protector when I walk the dog. I also used it as an outer layer over my hoodie when it was a bit cold and windy.
customer_reviews.author: T. Baer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Its okay for keeping the rain off you, but the material is very, very thin and lightweight. The seams are not finished so there are threads hanging everywhere which foul up the zippers. I would not recommend for hiking or strenuous use.
customer_reviews.author: Leafpeeper

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great on the Emerald Isle
customer_reviews.text: We went to Ireland just when Hurricane Lorenzo broke loose in the Atlantic. The SoTeer Rain Poncho really stood up to the weather, and dried super fast.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cohn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit. I can roll up and put in ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. I can roll up and put in my back for those unexpected spring showers. I love this rain coat and it's like a windbreaker also. For the chilly mornings but hot later in the day with a chance of rain days.
customer_reviews.author: deborah w.w

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little pop over for emergencies. It is thinner material than I had hoped for, but it packs compactly
customer_reviews.author: Kb

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this raincoat
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I ordered this raincoat- so comfortable and wore it out once got 3 compliments. great quality and great fit-highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: liz kirschner

customer_reviews.title: Cute but didn’t last long.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and roomy as a poncho should be. Love that it is a zipper and not a pull over poncho. I thought it came with a pouch to make it packable but I guess not. I was looking for something small and packable for hiking so I guess I will have to find a small pouch to try and shove it in. Update: while it is really cute, I finally got a chance to use it during a trip to Costa Rica. The zipper broke after the first day of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaked
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for a trip, one leaked and I had to throw it away and purchase another on my trip. I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Jean

customer_reviews.title: I love ponchos
customer_reviews.text: The color & fabric look different online. (The pic makes it look classier) but it’s just a casual poncho
customer_reviews.author: ElissaRidiculous

customer_reviews.title: Good for short people !!
customer_reviews.text: I am only 5' tall and find that the poncho was a good length. It has been great. If I could change one thing it would be to make the pocket openings a bit larger.
customer_reviews.author: jneen

customer_reviews.title: not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: The rain poncho looks good, fits good, but is NOT waterproof! I live in an area that has a lot of heavy rain in the green season, which is now. I am wet after a walk to the store. Just thought future buyers should know.
customer_reviews.author: Joni D.

customer_reviews.title: Returned it.
customer_reviews.text: Not cute or flattering at all. Felt like I was wearing a moo moo. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: RLayson

customer_reviews.title: Buy Bigger...color not pictured
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 sizes larger fits good. Color is no where near pictured. Pastel green not olive. Quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Rae rae

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: Could be a little more substantial material - but I like it. Don't know if it's waterproof. Good windbreaker.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Bonnet

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one for myself and after seeing & using it I decided to order 3 more for gifts. Excellent product and meets the advertisement.
customer_reviews.author: AmyM

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: I’m 6 ft tall and this hits above the knee. Perfect
customer_reviews.author: indydog

customer_reviews.title: Fun cute little rain poncho
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and fit's great. I had to return because the 1st was too large, being I'm shorter, but free returns, was so worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Laurdalaur

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be Great!
customer_reviews.text: It fits as expected, it heavier than I had anticipated (which is a good thing). I bought it for a trip we are taking in March - - so have not had a use for it yet. Will revise after I use it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Low quality in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: Hard to unsnap and wherever there is a sewed seam it’s shredding and getting caught in the zipper. Wouldn’t recommend buying - disappointed with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Renee Seymour

customer_reviews.title: Good extra poncho to have on hand
customer_reviews.text: Great for trip to Europe. Very well made. Solid plastic. Doesn’t fold too small, though.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Brownyard

customer_reviews.title: Soteer Travel Raincoat
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my MIL. She really liked it. Wanted something light but with enough coverage to protect her from rain. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mama C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect small size
customer_reviews.text: Covered zipper. Choice of sizes - needed a small. Well tailored. Correct length for short person
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fine rain poncho
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had had this on our trip to Europe! I am buying this for future trips as a rain cover-up.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen cohl

customer_reviews.title: Not rain proof
customer_reviews.text: I walked for an hour in light rain and got wet.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Mock

customer_reviews.title: I am kept dry from the sea mist and/or rain all night.
customer_reviews.text: I volunteer at the beach in Ft. Lauderdale during the night to help the baby sea turtles safely make it from the sand into the ocean.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Best rain poncho I've had!
customer_reviews.text: Loose enough to wear my purse underneath an thick enough to keep out the wind.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: It’s great protection from rain year round.
customer_reviews.text: I like that fabric is thin and can be worn year round. Like that it has a zipper and snaps. Love the hood.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job.  Fits Great!
customer_reviews.text: Did the job! Purchased for a lightweight to wear on a trip over sweaters in needed. It fits well. Does the job. Looks cool. Works well over bulky, warm sweaters.Right price.
customer_reviews.author: Qrys

customer_reviews.title: Definitely keeps you dry!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. It does have plenty of room, which doesn’t bother me. The hood stayed on and it kept me bone dry in the middle of a crazy downpour, 4 inches in 30 min. I love the rain slicker. The red is really cute too.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Grey

customer_reviews.title: Everything nice except the hood
customer_reviews.text: Very nice coverage, except for the hood. Spacious, love the pockets and the openness.
customer_reviews.author: CelloReader

customer_reviews.title: I will be happy as a light summer rain
customer_reviews.text: Much thinner fabric than expected but if the snap holds up and does not tear, I will be happy as a light summer rain coat
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Perfect poncho
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Exactly what I wanted. Easy to slip on/off. Keeps me dry.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap cheap cheap
customer_reviews.text: Cheap material. More like a $5 poncho than a $40 poncho. I returned it immediately. Very thin material and the medium fit like a 2X
customer_reviews.author: Cindy HD

customer_reviews.title: Buy now
customer_reviews.text: Love this. It is big and comfy. It is the perfect layering poncho. It is made with high-quality rainproof material. I am thrilled with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J. malone

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This fits the bill for packability and style, wish that it were a bit longer for this tall gal!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Vinopal

customer_reviews.title: A little thin
customer_reviews.text: This is a good travel/emergency poncho. Falls between the poncho's you buy in a little bag in an emergency and a raincoat. Don't use it as your go-to raincoat.
customer_reviews.author: judith schanzer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: I love my rain coat. It is exactly what I need during this time of intermit weather we are having.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Baskin

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like that the hood blows off and doesn’t stay on in the rain. But I love it otherwise. Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but...
customer_reviews.text: Overall love it, but will have to return as top snap pulled loose at its attachment. This wouldn’t have happened if it had been reinforced. May request exchange for another!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Product durability !!!
customer_reviews.text: I love how this is different and keeps you drier !!!
customer_reviews.author: ann freeman

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: I probably could have bought this at the dollar store. It's very thin!
customer_reviews.author: curly

customer_reviews.title: Black Rain poncho
customer_reviews.text: I work on a tourist railroad it's perfect for those rainy days keeping dry. Who wants to be wet for the rest of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this raincoat EXCEPT the snap buttons. Mine are extremely tight and I have to pry them open. I am always afraid I am going to tear the material to separate them. It’s still the one hassle I don’t like.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Allen

customer_reviews.title: I like this hooded rain cape
customer_reviews.text: I like this hooded rain cape. I seen one on The View, this one is made better & priced a lot less. Another winner👍
customer_reviews.author: Renea Reneanaturally

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and classy!
customer_reviews.text: I read several reviews before purchasing that were very helpful. I bought the XL to have room for a backpack. The red is quite classy looking.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Gailey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I get so many compliments on this. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Margaret H.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a hole where snap should be. Snaps very difficult to open , also don't like the material.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and dry
customer_reviews.text: I really like the color and light weight. I’m sorry there isn’t an extra small size for us shorter gals.
customer_reviews.author: Ann D Getty

customer_reviews.title: Bad snaps
customer_reviews.text: Poncho has heavy duty snaps that I found impossible to open. The fabric is lightweight and will rip when you pull on the snaps to open them.
customer_reviews.author: patra

customer_reviews.title: Good poncho.
customer_reviews.text: Nice poncho. Not at all plasticy. Lightweight. Durable. Fits nice.
customer_reviews.author: FMeadows

customer_reviews.title: Okay  but color wrong.
customer_reviews.text: Style good. Sewing good. Fabric seems okay. But color way off and very disappointing. Manufacturer should change and correct. (Speaking of the gray.)
customer_reviews.author: len

customer_reviews.title: Not helpful with customer complaints
customer_reviews.text: Cheap plastic- very over sized. Will never wear this. Requested refund. Terrible customer service experience. Will never order from this site again.
customer_reviews.author: Debra D.

customer_reviews.title: Much better than most rain ponchos I’ve owned.
customer_reviews.text: Love the red color and fit. It will blow off your head in wind.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice swing jacket that can be worn over bulky clothes.
customer_reviews.author: ecprout

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight easy to pack
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for Mom. Timing couldn’t have been better. She is in a sling and now has easy raincoat to use
customer_reviews.author: Michele L

customer_reviews.title: Runs big
customer_reviews.text: Love the color green but it sent it back for a small. I wish they had a extra small.
customer_reviews.author: pamela kane

customer_reviews.title: Great rain poncho
customer_reviews.text: Great rain poncho . I chose the gray one and just love. I wear a sweatshirt underneath .
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: It's still gonna work for now
customer_reviews.text: I put it on zipped it up and snapped the buttons and the bottom one would not come apart and ripped a hole in jacket
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way bigger than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Tried 2 sizes and both looked huge on me. Too bad because I likes the fabric and construction of the poncho.
customer_reviews.author: Kung fu grammie

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Good quality. In time delivery. Thank you! Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

product_meta.title: SoTeer Rain Poncho for Womens Batwing-Sleeved Hooded Raincoat Waterproof Packable Rain Jacket with Pockets (6 Colors S-XXL)
feature_bullets: [MATERIAL]: 100% waterproof, extremely water resistant, quick drying, touched soft and comfortable, superior material makes raincoat cute and stylish in this season.
[DESIGN]: Batwing-sleeve, Zipper and Button Closure, Two Front Pocket, Quick-drying material, Easy to packable.
This 2018 lastest fashion trend raincoat will give you a sort of fresh feeling and adding a perfect beauty in the rain.
[OCCASSION]: Suit for Climbing, Cycling, Camping, Hiking, Running, Traveling ,Fishing and Other Outdoor Sport. Perfect for the rainy and snowy season.
